Html:
This Split Pst Tool Software can work as the repository for saving all email items in Microsoft Outlook such as emails, notes, contacts, calendar entries and other vital personal information. All the valuable personal and business-related information in Outlook is saved in .PST files and losing such vital information could be hazardous.

See more details: http://www.recoverydeletedfiles.com/split-pst-tool.html

Efficiently splits a large PST file into smaller and manageable PSTs, based on specified PST split criterion, such as Date, Size, Mail Id and Folder.After splitting a large-sized PST file into smaller pieces, they can be easily accessed with MS Outlook and are completely independent of original PST file.Split PST software is a useful solution which splits large sized PST file at the rapid rate.To get more relevant info and FREE trail of this software visit here :- http://www.undeletepcfiles.com/split-pst-file.html
